TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class DataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

summary.span: 用作所有以列表或表格形式显示数据的 ASP.NET 2.0 版数据绑定控件的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in list or tabular form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于 ASP.NET 控件的基类，这些控件从 ASP.NET 数据源控件检索表格或列表样式数据，并将控件的用户界面 (UI) 元素绑定到该数据以供显示。The class is the base class used for ASP.NET controls that retrieve tabular or list-style data from an ASP.NET data source control and bind user-interface (UI) elements of the control to that data for display. 复合数据绑定控件（如、和） ; 列表样式的数据绑定控件（如和） 和其他控件（如 派生自） 。Composite data-bound controls such as , , and ; list-style data-bound controls such as and ; and other controls such as derive from . 页面开发人员不会 直接使用该类; 而是使用派生自此类的控件。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 控件开发人员扩展此类以创建数据绑定控件，这些控件可用于实现接口的类 以及从和类派生的类 。Control developers extend this class to create data-bound controls that work with classes that implement the interface and classes that derive from the and classes. 从类派生类时 ，重写方法， 将控件的 UI 元素绑定到方法检索的数据 。When deriving a class from the class, override the method to bind the UI elements of your control to data retrieved by the method. 在大多数情况下， 方法是您将在派生类中重写的唯一方法。In most cases, the method is the only method you will override in your derived class. 对于 ASP.NET 2.0 数据绑定控件， 方法等效于 `DataBind` 方法，并调用来在运行时绑定数据。For ASP.NET 2.0 data-bound controls, the method is the equivalent of the `DataBind` method, and is called to bind data at run time. 方法调用 和 方法。The method calls the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生类 ，以创建自定义的数据绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class from the class to create a custom data-bound control. `TextBoxSet`控件 为从其关联的数据源控件检索到的每个数据项创建一个控件，并在运行时绑定到数据项的值。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item retrieved from its associated data source control, and binds to the value of the data item at run time. 此方法的当前实现将 `Render` 控件呈现 为无序列表。The current implementation of the `Render` method renders the controls as an unordered list. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `TextBoxSet` 在前面的示例中定义的控件，并将其绑定到 控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `TextBoxSet` control, defined in the previous example, and bind it to an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxsetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxsetvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在数据方法正被调用时发生。

span.span: Occurs when data methods are being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件的目的是让你有机会指定要调用的数据方法与对象的对象不同 。The purpose of this event is to give you an opportunity to specify that the data methods to be called are on a different object than the object. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

summary.span: 当数据源包含多个不同的数据项列表时，获取或设置数据绑定控件绑定到的数据列表的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the list of data that the data-bound control binds to, in cases where the data source contains more than one distinct list of data items.

value.span: 数据绑定控件绑定到的特定数据列表的名称（如果数据源控件提供了多个列表）。

span.span: The name of the specific list of data that the data-bound control binds to, if more than one list is supplied by a data source control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值 存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 通过调用方法从关联的数据源控件中检索对象 。The method retrieves a object from the associated data source control by calling the method. 如果 使用属性来标识数据源， 则会创建一个默认对象。If the property is used to identify a data source, a default object is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 调用方法以 从关联的数据源控件中检索对象，并 调用方法来检索数据。The following code example demonstrates how the method is called to retrieve the object from the associated data source control and the method is called to retrieve the data. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法 在内部调用方法。The method calls the method internally. 有效的 实例由这两个方法检索，并由对象缓存， 直到该 方法发出数据源已更改的信号。A valid instance is retrieved by these two methods and is cached by the object until the method signals that the data source has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将启用 `Item` 和 `BindItem` 数据绑定表达式。Setting this property enables the `Item` and `BindItem` data-binding expressions. 设置此方法会自动启用动态数据功能。Setting this method automatically enables Dynamic Data functionality. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

summary.span: 将视图状态中的控件状态设置为成功绑定到数据。

span.span: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件在视图状态中维护一个值，该值指示当前是否已绑定到数据。The data-bound control maintains a value in view state that indicates whether it is currently bound to data. 方法将值设置为 `true` 。The method sets the value to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示派生的 数据绑定控件类如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how the method is used by a derived data-bound control class. 使用方法检索数据并将 其绑定到控件后 ，将 属性设置为， `false` 并 调用方法以指示控件已完成绑定，而不再要求在当前页的生命周期内使用它。After data is retrieved by the method and bound to the control with the method, the property is set to `false` and the method is called to signal that the control has completed binding and no longer requires it during the current page's life cycle. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件，基础数据源已更改，控件应重新绑定并且应执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed. 通常， 当数据源视图的属性发生更改时，将调用方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. `true` 当引发事件时，类将属性设置为 。The class sets the property to `true` when it raises the event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true` HTTP 请求为回发但启用了视图状态但尚未绑定数据绑定控件时，类会重写方法，以将属性设置为。The method is overridden by the class to set the property to `true` in cases where the HTTP request is a postback and view state is enabled but the data-bound control has not yet been bound. 此方案常见于控件（如 和）中 ，在运行时更改控件的可见性。This scenario is common with controls such as and , where the visibility of the control is changed at run time.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将数据源中的数据绑定到控件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从类派生数据绑定控件时，实现此方法而不是方法 。Implement this method instead of the method when you derive a data-bound control from the class. 通过在中放置控件的数据绑定逻辑， 您可以避免 按错误的顺序引发和事件。Placing your control's data-binding logic in enables you to avoid the and events being raised in the wrong order. 虽然基类 不为此方法提供任何特定的实现，但方法 会调用方法， 将 (UI) 控件的任何用户界面的值绑定到方法检索的数据 。While the base class provides no specific implementation for this method, the method is called by the method to bind the values of any user interface (UI) controls to the data that is retrieved by the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 派生自的类中的方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class derived from . `TextBoxSet`控件将 为它所绑定到的每个数据项创建一个控件。The `TextBoxSet` control creates a control for each data item it is bound to. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#5)]

summary.span: 从关联的数据源中检索数据。

span.span: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索数据以将数据绑定到数据绑定控件的元素后，将调用方法。The method is called after data is retrieved to bind data to elements of the data-bound control. 派生类型重写此方法，以便仅在默认实现不足的情况下检索数据。Derived types override this method to retrieve data only if the default implementation is not adequate. 通常，足以提供一个 委托来执行任何自定义数据工作，而不是实现 方法。Typically, it is sufficient to provide a delegate that performs any custom data work, rather than implementing the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以使用方法从关联的数据源中检索数据 ，并将其绑定到控件的元素。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to retrieve data from an associated data source using the method and bind it to the elements of the control. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/CS/textboxset.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.TextBoxSet/VB/textboxset.vb#3)]

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的所有视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
The control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

summary.span: 获取数据绑定控件从数据源控件检索数据时使用的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.

value.span: 数据绑定控件用于检索数据的 值。

span.span: A value used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性调用 方法来创建默认 对象。The property calls the method to create a default object.

Public Overridable Property SelectMethod As String

summary.span: 为了读取数据要调用的方法的名称。

span.span: The name of the method to call in order to read data.
The name of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性将导致模型绑定用作数据绑定方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 有关如何在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定的教程系列，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

Protected Overrides Sub TrackViewState ()

override this.TrackViewState : unit -> unit

summary.span: 导致要跟踪的控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes view-state changes to the control to be tracked so they can be stored in the control's object.

param.span: 设置为 属性的对象。

span.span: An object set to the property.

summary.span: 验证数据绑定控件绑定到的对象是否可以和该控件一同使用。

span.span: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅在 属性的类的赋值函数 (`set` 访问器) 中调用 。The method is only called in the class's mutator (`set` accessor) for the property. 类检查为属性设置的对象的类型， 以确保它是 、 或接口的实例 。The class checks the type of the object that is set for the property to ensure that it is an instance of the , , or interface.

exception.span: 参数传递的对象不为 ，也不是可以识别的类型。

span.span: The object passed by the parameter is not or a recognized type.
